formalpara.title: Figure 2. FOG-1, FOG-3 and the FEM proteins promote spermatogenesis
formalpara.para: Proteins are shown in uppercase, and genes in lowercase italics, to indicate that TRA-1 controls transcription of the fog-1 and fog-3 genes. Positive interactions are indicated with an arrow, and negative ones by a “--|”. Genes that promote spermatogenesis are blue, and those that promote oogenesis are red.
